snippet: Representative Nancy Pelosi, second from right, met with the singer Cyndi Lauper, second from left, and others on Thursday in Washington, to discuss gay rights advocacy and same-sex marriage.
abstract: Representative Nancy Pelosi, second from right, met with the singer Cyndi Lauper, second from left, and others on Thursday in Washington, to discuss gay rights advocacy and same-sex marriage.

headline.main: The Caucus Click: Lauper and Pelosi
